column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////I appreciate your candor
column2: but it would serve me and my staff much more to know specifically how your needs were not met in these areas. We rely on our customers' feedback to help us shape policy and to keep our ship sailing forward. We'll never be all things to all people
column3: but we are always willing to dig in and work hard to improve our business and earn an honest living.
